means: 不须花钱的，无须付出代价的

sentence.Network_en: While it is a displacement activity, the ban is not costless.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管这是一项无用功,但该禁令并非没有成本.

sentence.Network_en: Offering less pukka security is not costless.
sentence.Network_cn: 提供不怎么可靠的安全性也并非没有代价.

sentence.Network_en: Web pages are not printed materials, resizing and reframing paragraphs are virtually costless and effortless.
sentence.Network_cn: 网页并非印刷实体, 缩放照片是一件非常容易和有效的事情.

list.abs: when a man send costless jewellery to a woman , maybe he would like something what returned back to him were many .当一个男人送给一个女人昂贵的珠宝，也许他想要的能回报他的东西有很多。

auth_sentence.content: Make sure you don't spoil the gift of nearly costless funds by incurring expenses you can easily avoid.

auth_sentence.content: "If a copyright holder misbehaves, we want people to know it's not costless," Lessig added.
